description: India is being seen as a bright spot. Growth is projected to remain among the highest in the world: PM In less than 3 years, our government has transformed the economy: PM Modi Financial markets can
caption: narendramodi.in
message:
Spoke on India's economic transformation, role of financial markets & more at inauguration of new NISM campus. GoI is committed to following sound & prudent economic policies to ensure that India continues to have a bright future in the long run.
